extension.summary: Watch live TV channels from DigiOnline.ro
extension.description:
Kodi addon for accessing DigiOnline.ro live TV channels.
User registration and login credentials are required in order to access DigiOnline.ro media content.
Visit https://www.digiromania.ro for more details.
extension.disclaimer: The author is not connected to or in any other way affiliated with Kodi, Team Kodi, the XBMC foundation, RCS RDS SA, digi24.ro or digionline.ro.
extension.news:
Starting with Kodi 19 (Matrix), Python 2.x was replaced with Python 3.x.
When installing the add-on, please make sure you're downloading and using the add-on version matching the Kodi release installed on your device.
Matching repository and package versions are listed below.
* 19.x.y.z addon version(s) ===> Kodi 19 (Matrix) * 18.x.y.z addon version(s) ===> Kodi 18 (Leia)
Visit https://github.com/cralin/plugin.video.DigiOnline.ro/wiki for more details.
